title: Optimize search query with proper indexing
author: devuser
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #215 - Optimize search query with proper indexing
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/215
Status: merged
Author: devuser

Description:
Search was doing a full table scan on every query. Added composite index on (tenant_id, created_at, content_vector) and rewrote the query to use the index properly.

Before: ~12 seconds average
After: ~200ms average

Changes:
- Added migration for new composite index
- Refactored searchRepository to use index hints
- Added query plan analysis to monitoring
